description: Multi-model AI orchestration with 31 tools, YAML workflows, and 5 token-optimized profiles.

PERPLEXITY_API_KEY.description: Perplexity API key for web search, research, and reasoning (https://www.perplexity.ai/settings/api)

GROK_API_KEY.description: Grok/xAI API key for code analysis, debugging, and architecture (https://console.x.ai/)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for GPT-5 analysis and comparison (https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key for brainstorming and code/text analysis (https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: OpenRouter API key for Qwen3 Coder and other models

TACHIBOT_PROFILE.description: Tool profile selection: minimal, research_power, code_focus, balanced, or full (default: balanced)
